thread.title: Stopped in for a drink at the lounge
thread.title_full: Stopped in for a drink at the lounge - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: creeker98
title: Stopped in for a drink at the lounge
text: A group of us were visiting NYC, and not staying at the Best Western Premier Herald Square, stopped in the lounge for a drink. BEST, BEST experience ever. Stephen, host/bartender, was the BEST. Cannot rave enough about our experience. Exceptionally clean. Stylish and welcoming. Although we usually stay at a different hotel when we are in NYC, we have decided to stay at Best Western Herald Square on our next visit. This decision is based solely on the hospitality of Stephen.
